
= HTML ATTRIBUTES =

# this attribute will check for empty fields
required = "yes"

# use pre-defined rules for input validation [Note: to add custom use rule(regex) in js code]
rule = "alpha, numeric, floating, alnum, alnumhyph, email"

# minimum length to allow [Note: use numbers e.g 8]
minlength = "(length)"


# maximum length to allow
maxlength = "(length)"
